description:
Hyoudou Kiyoharu is a professional dancer and http://anidb.net/ch88093 [Shizuku]`s partner for 9 years, Hyoudou is a genius dancer who looks unmotivated at most times, but is serious when it comes to dance. His family owns a dance studio and his http://anidb.net/ch90869 [mother] is the coach.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Hyoudou Kiyoharu
